function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 increasing food insecurity","Impact":"Reduction in purchasing power and ability to produce and distribute food for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement food aid programs, support local agricultural production, and provide financial assistance to those in need","Technologies":"Online platforms for food distribution, agricultural technology, and financial support systems","People":"Vulnerable populations, those with low purchasing power","Owner":"Government, NGOs, local community"},{"Description":"COVID-19 impacting global health systems","Impact":"Pressure on health systems, collapse of fragile health systems, and limited access to healthcare","Mitigation":"Increase healthcare capacity, implement safety measures, and provide support for healthcare workers","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices, and healthcare management software","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and communities","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government, international health organizations"},{"Description":"COVID-19 disrupting quality education","Impact":"Closure of schools and limited access to distance learning for students","Mitigation":"Invest in educational technology, provide internet access, and support teachers in delivering remote education","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, educational apps, and internet infrastructure","People":"Students, teachers, and education administrators","Owner":"Education institutions, government, educational technology providers"}]}
